messages.title: GET BREXIT DONE: Unleash Britain’s Potential
messages.content: We need to deal with Brexit for the future of our country. In the 2016 EU referendum, the British public voted to leave. They rightly expect their politicians to deliver. Boris Johnson stood up for the UK and has secured a good deal. A deal that takes us out of the EU and puts us in control of our money, laws and borders. And a deal that allows us to strike new trade agreements with the rest of the world. A vote for the Conservatives will help deliver Brexit so we can move onto important domestic issues. A Conservative vote means supporting a successful economy providing additional funds for the NHS, education, law and order and many other public services. It’s time to get Brexit done and move on.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Cutting corporation tax from 28% to 19%, encouraging more businesses to invest and grow in the UK. Pledging to cut business rates for shops, cinemas, and pubs. Support businesses by spending £37 billion for transport and digital infrastructure.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Biggest NHS Cash Boost in its History
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The NHS is receiving £33.9 billion by 2023-24. Over 17,000 more doctors and over 16,000 more nurses. Opening 5 new medical schools to train the next generation of NHS staff. 1 million NHS staff, including nurses, midwives, and cleaners, will see a pay rise by at least 6.5% by 2020-21.
Increasing school funding by £14 billion. A minimum £5,000 per secondary school pupil and £4,000 per primary school pupil by 2021-22. Teachers' salaries to increase to £30,000 by 2022-23.

issues.health: The NHS is receiving £33.9 billion by 2023-24. Under the Conservatives, there are over 17,000 more doctors and over 16,000 more nurses.
